snippet: Marathoners complained when race organizers said two weeks ago that they would stop transporting bags from the starting line in Staten Island to the finish line in Central Park.
abstract: New York City marathon officials reverse course and say they will allow runners to check bags at the starting line; comes after marathoners complained when it was announced that officials would stop transporting bags from the starting line in Staten Island to the finish line in Central Park.
lead_paragraph: Marathoners complained when race organizers said two weeks ago that they would stop transporting bags from the starting line in Staten Island to the finish line in Central Park.

headline.seo: In Reversal, New York City Marathon Will Transport Bags
headline.main: New York City Marathon, in Reversal, Will Ferry Bags
headline.print_headline: New York City Marathon, In Reversal, Will Ferry Bags
